item.title: How to Navigate the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Use “Go To”: With Menu With Keyboard How to Clear the “Go To” Window How to Exit the “Go To” Window: With Click With Keyboard No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Use "Go To" With Menu Step 1: First edit a Notepad file. In the upper left click the “Edit” button. Step 2: In the menu that opens, click “Go to”.
